title: Redefining Beauty and Suffering with Strength (Ft. Katherine Wolf)
description:
Have you ever wanted a manual that will just show you how to skip through the painful chapters of your life? Or maybe you’re going through a hard season and you’re asking yourself: How is this my life?

In this episode of SHE, Jordan talks with Katherine Wolf, author of Suffer Strong. After a near-fatal stroke at the age of 26, Katherine shares her own powerful story of loss and healing, and how to build a beautiful life right in the middle of the pain.

Tune in to learn:

  • How to find strength in the middle of a painful season and make a beautiful life right where you’re at
  • 3 Ways to embrace your own unique beauty
  • Why it’s important to cultivate who you let speak into your life
  • How to get through suffering together with your spouse

Learn more about Katherine on Instagram by following her here.
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
